The Triumph of Truth 

     Skepticism may treat the claims of God's law with jest, scoffing, and denial. The spirit of worldliness may contaminate the many and control the few; the cause of God may hold its ground only by great exertion and continual sacrifice; 
                                                                           165
yet in the end of the truth will triumph gloriously.-- Prophets and Kings, p. 186.
